steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"11md8","text":"Seed HEK293 cells. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7i6et","text":"A) For Western Blotting, we recommend seeding 2.5 x 10^5 cells per well of a 12-well culture plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epsjo","text":"B) For Immunofluorescence, we recommend seeding 1.2 x 10^5 cells per well of a 24-well culture plate.
